summary: A Perfect Circle is an American rock band started in 1999 by Billy Howerdel and Maynard James Keenan. They released three albums in the early 2000s: *Mer de Noms*, *Thirteenth Step*, and *Emotive*. After a hiatus, they reunited in 2010 and released their fourth album, *Eat the Elephant*, in 2018. The band has had various members over the years, with Keenan and Howerdel being the only constants. Their albums have been well-liked by critics and fans, selling over 4 million copies by 2005.
title: A Perfect Circle
